name: AudioComponentDescription
desc: Identifying information for an audio component.

items.name: var componentType: OSType
items.desc: A unique 4-byte code identifying the interface for the component.

items.name: var componentSubType: OSType
items.desc: A 4-byte code that you can use to indicate the purpose of a component. For example, you could use lpas or lowp as a mnemonic indication that an audio unit is a low-pass filter.

items.name: var componentManufacturer: OSType
items.desc: The unique vendor identifier, registered with Apple, for the audio component.

items.name: init(componentType: OSType, componentSubType: OSType, componentManufacturer: OSType, componentFlags: UInt32, componentFlagsMask: UInt32)
